title: Cant Patch the game 99% stuck i have tried almost everything
body:
So when i loaded the client i was stuck on new updates
so i tried reinstall 
then as i was patching the game i got stuck at 99% 0kbps
i let it do its own thing for hours
(6 hours)


i have done everything i found online
i have deleted folders, reseted winsock,run game as administrator,turn off firewall,installed .newframe work 3.5:
i have ethernet cable
i changed regions languages,peers
i downloaded hextech
i have tried once clean uninstall and then reinstall
since then i do not even get to 99% 
but im stuck on screen
i changed to a public domain name system
(as second image shows)

i have done system restoration twice
nothing seems to work
(i checked reddit forums and support)


http://imgur.com/a/dl2xn

replies.body:
@Broporo @Porocles

We tried helping them over on the League Community discord and we exhausted our options. I asked them if they could post here so hopefully you guys would catch something we didn't. Thank you for taking a look at this.

Hey there!  Damn! You certainly have gone through a lot and it's been quite a journey for you coming from the community discord.  I'll certainly do my best to help, and we won't give up either!  Before anything, make sure that you've got enough space on your hard drive to proceed with the client transition.  For the time being, your folder is going to have game files from both the legacy and updated version until the old stuff is removed.

The connection troubleshooting performed is solid, but we need to make sure that League is being added as an exception in entirely.  There might be blocks or security settings that not properly installing the update.  My suggestion in this case would be to go over each step of the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to make sure access is allowed.

Once that's taken care of, use the hextech repair tool to perform a clean reinstall.  This will get rid of any old or bad files and get you setup to update the client.  With permissions settings fixed up, it should be smooth sailing.

Let me know if you run into any issues!

i have followed the instructions and no progress at all 
im still stuck on patching

Thanks for getting back to me, and don't give up. Grab the logs you got from the HRT, and attach them to a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Our tech team will continue working with you to get this fixed up.  Let them know everything you've tried so far, and we'll go from there.  Hang tight!
